special_delivery.description: Gain significant speed while inside the church.

for_your_convenience.description: Places a furnace in front of the altar.

saving_grace.description: Opens a farm near the altar that activates when appeasement is low, and increases farm speed by 50%.

devotion.description: Makes the melon god's appeasement decay twice as slowly.

forgiving_gods.description: Slightly decreases the threshold at which you get punished, and decreases the time between blessings.

harness_the_spirits.description: Unlocks an additional shop to spend further favors.

faster_cooking.description: Allows players to sneak while cooking to quintuple speed.

faster_selling.description: Allows players to sneak while selling to quintuple speed.

rise_from_ashes.description: Gives the king a second chance, and resistance during their current life.

better_farmers.description: Breaking melons will break all adjacent melons.

strict_trade_laws.description: Slows down the speed of imports by 50%, caps them at 30, and makes them 50% less likely to contain contraband.

better_return_rates.description: Citizens are 16.67% more likely to get gold from selling to the merchant.

unconfined_existence.description: Opens a door near the shop that unlocks an additional 6 upgrades.

gold_rush.description: Unlocks an event that occurs if you do well at appeasing the melon god.

the_graceful_one.description: Further reduces the threshold at which you get punished, and further decreases the time between blessings.

servitude.description: Decreases the rate at which appeasement decays by 50%.

another_dimension.description: Opens a portal to another dimension behind the castle.
